dcterms:creator: E. Bailly-Bailliére
S. Bengio
F. Bimbot
M. Hamouz
J. Kittler
J. Mariéthoz
B. Ruiz
dcterms:description: BANCA is a European secure system project which is based on face and voice recognition in four European languages. The database includes 208 people, with an equal distribution of genders.
dcterms:title: BANCA

dcterms:creator: E. Bailly-Bailliére
S. Bengio
F. Bimbot
M. Hamouz
J. Kittler
J. Mariéthoz
B. Ruiz
dcterms:description: MyIdea is a multimodal biometric database designed to conduct research experiments in Identity Verification, utilizing talking face, audio, fingerprints, signature, handwriting, and hand geometry parameters.
dcterms:title: MyIdea

dcterms:creator: J. Fierrez
J. Ortega-Garcia
D. T. Toledano
J. Gonzalez-Rodriguez
dcterms:description: BioSec is a multimodal biometric database that includes fingerprints from three different sensors, frontal face images from a webcam, iris images from an iris sensor, and voice recordings.
dcterms:title: BioSec

dcterms:creator: H. Behravan
K. Faez
dcterms:description: Twins' multimodal biometric database consists of biometric traits from twins, including 2D face images, fingerprints, offline handwritten texts, videos of moving faces, spectral face images, and thermal face images.
dcterms:title: Twins' multimodal biometric database

dcterms:creator: Z. Sun
A. A. Paulino
J. Feng
Z. Chai
T. Tan
A. K. Jain
dcterms:description: CASIA database includes face, iris, and fingerprint images from 92 pairs of twins and 2 sets of triplets, with images taken indoors on the same day.
dcterms:title: CASIA database

dcterms:creator: Z. Sun
A. A. Paulino
J. Feng
Z. Chai
T. Tan
A. K. Jain
dcterms:description: Audio-Visual Twins Database contains face images, videos, and voice records of 39 pairs of twins, including side profile images that show ear features.
dcterms:title: Audio-Visual Twins Database

dcterms:creator: H. Behravan
K. Faez
dcterms:description: Twins Ear Database includes ear images of twins, which are used for ear recognition tasks, facing challenges such as mirrored images and occlusion.
dcterms:title: Twins Ear Database

dcterms:creator: A. Y. M. A. N. EL-SAYED
dcterms:description: Twins Speech Database is used for speech recognition tasks, focusing on the unique characteristics of twins' speech.
dcterms:title: Twins Speech Database
